LanguageData.ATR_MechFallTargetterBeam.label: Mechfall
LanguageData.ATR_OrbitalTargeterMechFall.label: M7-Series deployment targeter
LanguageData.ATR_OrbitalTargeterMechFall.description: An ancient targetting unit for an M7-Series war mech. The device indicates that there is indeed a fully active mech awaiting the command to drop on a designated target. It doesn't seem to indicate what it will target, however.
